document_data.name: Angrath Woodwise
document_data.mainbody: '''Angrath Woodwise''' was one of servants in Lord [[Marsten]]'s hunting lodge.
document_data.History: Angrath was the chief hunter for Lord Marsten until his master was killed some time before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]] and the lodge was occupied by [[Cult of the Dragon]] agents under [[Talis Kasterel]]. She decided to use Angrath and the other servants as her own. However, Angrath was demoted to head groom and his position went to [[Trepsin]]. Angrath greatly hated the [[troll]].
